TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Examination of the inside of the nose using a nasoscope (or rhinoscope). A nasoscope is a thin, tube-like instrument with a light and a lens for viewing. It may also have a tool to remove tissue to be checked under a microscope for signs of disease. Also called rhinoscopy.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Examen del interior de la nariz con un nasoscopio (o rinoscopio).
